DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine if a program of physical activity, nutritional supplements and relaxation techniques is effective at decreasing post operative complications in frail colorectal cancer patients undergoing resection.
DOC.brief_title: Using Multimodal Prehabilitation to Improve Outcomes for Frail Patients Undergoing Resection of Colorectal Cancer
DOC.criteria: Colorectal cancer patient undergoing resection Frail or intermediately frail patients (Fried score 2 and above) Unable to communicate in French or English Premorbid conditions contraindicating physical exercise (dementia, Parkinson Disease, previous stroke with paresis, taking carbidopa/levodopa, donepezil or antidepressants)
